verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, my Lord,
my God, my all!
How can I love
Thee as I ought?
And how revere
this wondrous gift,
So far surpassing
hope or thought?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sweet Sacrament,
we Thee adore!
Oh, make us love
Thee more and more.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Had I but Mary's
sinless heart,
To love Thee,
my with dearest King,
Oh, with what bursts
fervent praise,
Thy goodness, Jesus,
would I sing!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ah, see! within a creature's
hand the vast Creator
deigns to be,
Reposing, infant - like,
as though on Joseph's arm,
or Mary's knee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thy Body, Soul
and Godhead, all!
O mystery of love divine!
I cannot compass
all I have,
For all Thou hast and
art are mine!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sound, sound,
his praise, higher still,
And come, ye angels,
to our aid;
'Tis God, 'tis God,
the very God
Whose power both man
and angels made!
